::Feline::

She stopped and took a step back. "I'm sorry, I should have looked 
where I was going." She smiled and purred softly. "I'm feeling much 
better now. Thank you for asking."  She looked at Chordate and smiled.
"I was wondering, if your not in a hurry to run off anywhere, could 
you show me the dining hall. I'm positively parched. Would take me so 
I may get a drink of water or something?" She smiled and walked so 
she stood next to him. She took him and purred softly. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Smokescreen/Chordate:
> 
> 
> 
> Chordate stopped, poitning to a door where Smokescreen, Grimmler, 
and Rex 
> were near, both weapons raised (that's how Yanshosh kind of 
described the 
> latter two in his e-mails, anyways).  "Ok, stand guard here 
Skulletron.  I 
> send a comm. to all of you later, when it's time to nab the 
intruder."
> 
> 
> ---
> 
> Chordate, running through the halls for the bridge, stopped 
suddenly as he 
> rounded a corner, nearly hitting Feline.
> 
> "Woah!" he yelled, stopping in time, only a few inches from the 
female robot. 
>  "Oh, sorry.  You were the hurt bot outside, how are you feeling?" 
he asked, 
> looking her up and down.
